verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the LORD. <S%H3050><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> praise <S%H1984><s%> him, O you servants <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
You that stand <S%H5975><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> in the courts <S%H2691><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%>
Praise <S%H1984><s%> the LORD; <S%H3050><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is good: <S%H2896><s%> sing <S%H2167><s%> praises to his name; <S%H8034><s%> for it is pleasant. <S%H5273><s%>
For the LORD <S%H3050><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> to himself, and Israel <S%H3478><s%> for his peculiar <S%H5459><s%> treasure.
For I know <S%H3045><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is great, <S%H1419><s%> and that our Lord <S%H113><s%> is above all <S%H3605><s%> gods. <S%H430><s%>

Whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> pleased, <S%H2654><s%> that did <S%H6213><s%> he in heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and in earth, <S%H776><s%> in the seas, <S%H3220><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> deep <S%H8415><s%> places.

He causes the vapors <S%H5387><s%> to ascend <S%H5927><s%> from the ends <S%H7097><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> he makes <S%H6213><s%> lightning <S%H1300><s%> for the rain; <S%H4306><s%> he brings <S%H3318><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%> out of his treasuries. <S%H214><s%>
Who smote <S%H5221><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> both of man <S%H120><s%> and beast. <S%H929><s%>

Who sent <S%H7971><s%> tokens <S%H226><s%> and wonders <S%H4159><s%> into the middle <S%H8432><s%> of you, O Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> on Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and on all <S%H3605><s%> his servants. <S%H5650><s%>
Who smote <S%H5221><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> and slew <S%H2026><s%> mighty <S%H6099><s%> kings; <S%H4428><s%>

Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of Canaan: <S%H3667><s%>
And gave <S%H5414><s%> their land <S%H776><s%> for an heritage, <S%H5159><s%> an heritage <S%H5159><s%> to Israel <S%H3478><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>
Your name, <S%H8034><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> endures for ever; <S%H5769><s%> and your memorial, <S%H2143><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> throughout all generations. <S%H1755><s%>
For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will judge <S%H1777><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> and he will repent <S%H5162><s%> himself concerning <S%H5921><s%> his servants. <S%H5650><s%>
The idols <S%H6091><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%> are silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of men's <S%H120><s%> hands. <S%H3027><s%>
They have mouths, <S%H6310><s%> but they speak <S%H1696><s%> not; eyes <S%H5869><s%> have they, but they see <S%H7200><s%> not;
They have ears, <S%H241><s%> but they hear <S%H238><s%> not; neither <S%H369><s%> is there any breath <S%H7307><s%> in their mouths. <S%H6310><s%>
They that make <S%H6213><s%> them are like <S%H3644><s%> to them: so is every <S%H3605><s%> one that trusts <S%H982><s%> in them.
Bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron: <S%H175><s%>
Bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Levi: <S%H3878><s%> you that fear <S%H3373><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the LORD <S%H3068><s%> out of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> which dwells <S%H7931><s%> at Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the LORD. <S%H3050><s%>
